basics.name: Maciej PÅ‚usa
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: From an early age I am passionate about technology. I've been programming commercially for 8 years. I derive pleasure from effective work on internet applications. I use the latest technology and standards. In my spare time I am driving a hybrid car.

work.summary: One of the largest companies organizing training in Szczecin. Courses in various fields focus around practical classes.
highlights: Work as a substantive expert on selected topics from the course for frontend developers.
Preparing presentations and exercises for classes.
Taking care of the whole course: work organization, task verification, role of manager's project and technical lead.

work.summary: Tidio Chat is a solution based on the live chat platform for communication with clients. The innovative approach allowed to occupy a high position on the market of this type of messengers.
highlights: Responsibility and work on every key element of a new project.
Building from scratch a new version of the panel for operators using new technologies.
Working with a widget loaded on hundreds of thousands of pages. The use of new architecture and optimization in all available ways.
Construction and development of new functions.
Everyday work using the SCRUM methodology.

work.summary: Website construction platform based on the WordPress engine.
highlights: Implementing new websites on the WordPress platform.
Building plugins based on good practices with the WordPress API.
Creating a system that generates copies of subsequent pages with all elements (database, files, data).
Creating a new interface with a simple website support in the form of a plugin.

work.summary: An innovative company implementing solutions based on big data and facebook applications.
highlights: Work on the concept of new products and applications produced by the company.
Creating new websites related to company identification.
Construction of new applications on the Facebook platform.
Cooperation on a prototype using Kinect technology.

work.summary: A company that develops and develops websites for real estate offices using the proprietary CMS system that works with the largest systems on the market to store real estate offers.
highlights: Construction of new websites for real estate offices with the use of proprietary CMS.
Expansion of existing websites with new modules and requirements.
Creating new modules to meet customer expectations.

work.summary: Social Startup aggregating information about exercises performed with the tracking function of training plans.
highlights: Creating a social website from scratch.
Construction of the entire interface composed of many screens.
UX tests on potential users.

awards.title: Dige Ninja Contest
awards.summary: The best graph visualization application using the d3.js library.

awards.title: The best computer game
awards.summary: Second place for the best computer game. A game based on turn-based gameplay using 3D tank models.

awards.title: Startup Weekend Warsaw
awards.summary: Second place for the project using Kinect technology in public advertising.

skills.name: Soft skills
keywords: Work organization focusing on process optimization
Running projects and teams at medium scale

languages.fluency: Smooth communication, reading and writing documentation.
